overview: This flesh flick was created in the back room of "Movie Star News" in an underground photography studio that specializes in the production of sadomasochistic and fetish film loops and stills. Both a front and a lure, its salacious sapphic literature adorns the window and attracts all kinds of depraved women. It is a refuge from the cold cruel society that defines what it means to be a woman, by who they fuck and by what is between their legs.
title: The Smut Peddlers
